languages.text: Среди спасенных реликвий династии нашлись священные оружейные масла и амуниция, которые помогут Вольному Торговцу в бою.
Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.
languages.original_text: Среди спасенных реликвий династии нашлись священные оружейные масла и амуниция, которые помогут Вольному Торговцу в бою.

traits.locale_text: Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty there were sacred unguents and ammo that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.
Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty there were sacred unguents and ammo that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.
Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.
Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.
Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.
Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.

languages.text: Entre las reliquias recuperadas de la dinastía había una variedad de ungüentos sagrados y munición que podría ayudar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en combate.
languages.original_text: Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.

traits.locale_text: Entre las reliquias recuperadas de la dinastía había una variedad de ungüentos sagrados y munición que podría ayudar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en combate.

languages.text: 救出された王朝の遺物の中に、戦闘で自由開拓者を助ける、聖なる軟膏や弾丸が数多くあった。
languages.original_text: Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.

traits.locale_text: 救出された王朝の遺物の中に、戦闘で自由開拓者を助ける、聖なる軟膏や弾丸が数多くあった。

languages.text: 回收的王朝遗物之中包含神圣药膏与弹药，可以在战斗中派上很大用场。
languages.original_text: Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.

traits.locale_text: 回收的王朝遗物之中包含神圣药膏与弹药，可以在战斗中派上很大用场。

languages.text: Unter dem geborgenen Relikten der Dynastie befand sich auch eine Reihe heiliger Salben sowie einige Munitionskisten, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} in der Kampf helfen könnten.
languages.original_text: Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.

traits.locale_text: Unter dem geborgenen Relikten der Dynastie befand sich auch eine Reihe heiliger Salben sowie einige Munitionskisten, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} in der Kampf helfen könnten.

languages.text: Parmi les reliques de la dynastie se trouvait un certain nombre d'onguents sacrés et de munitions susceptibles d'aider {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} au combat.
languages.original_text: Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.

traits.locale_text: Parmi les reliques de la dynastie se trouvait un certain nombre d'onguents sacrés et de munitions susceptibles d'aider {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} au combat.

languages.text: Kurtarılan hanedanlık yadigârlarının arasında birkaç kutsal özyağ ve Hür Tacir'e muharebede fayda sağlayacak mühimmatlar bulundu.
languages.original_text: Among the salvaged relics of the dynasty were a number of sacred unguents and ammunition that could assist the Rogue Trader in battle.
